pkgmetadata.longdescription:
runit is a process supervision suite with a focus on being usable as a sysvinit replacement. It provides similar functionality to packages like sys-apps/s6 and sys-process/daemontools, and a compatibility/migration path for the latter. As this package only provides an init and service manager, it still depends on sys-apps/openrc for the rc layer inbetween.
This package installs the Void Linux fork of runit, which contains a few maintenance patches on top of vanilla. By contrast, the package in the ::gentoo repository gives you Debian's patchset which diverges significantly from the original.
